name: UTIKit
summary: UTIKit is an UTI (Uniform Type Identifier) wrapper for Swift.
description:
UTIKit is a full featured library including entire UTI functions.

                   * Convertibility
                     * Filename extension
                     * MIME type
                     * OSType (OS X only)
                     * Pasteboard type (OS X only)
                   * Equality
                   * Conformance
                   * and othersâ€¦
